title: [Snyk] SNYK-DEBIAN13-TAR-5696683 in tar@1.35+dfsg-3.1
description:
## CVE-2005-2541

**Severity:** low
**Package:** tar@1.35+dfsg-3.1
**File:** `score-processor-lambda/Dockerfile`

**CVSS Score:** 9.8  
**Snyk Priority Score:** 150/1000

### CVEs
- [CVE-2005-2541](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2005-2541)

**Fix:** No automatic fix available. Review manually.

### Details
## NVD Description
**_Note:_** _Versions mentioned in the description apply only to the upstream `tar` package and not the `tar` package as distributed by `Debian`._
_See `How to fix?` for `Debian:13` relevant fixed versions and status._

Tar 1.15.1 does not properly warn the user when extracting setuid or setgid files, which may allow local users or remote attackers to gain privileges.
## Remediation
There is no fixed version for `Debian:13` `tar`.
